headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Take Home Triple on Lamar Contact Missions
content:
Lamar Davis is one of Los Santos’ most infamous career criminals, and for good reason. Pick up your iFruit to get in touch with him and rake in 3X GTA$ and RP on all Lamar Contact Missions, including Lowriders.

Plus, embark on an out of body experience in Short Trips this week. When you come down, you’ll return home with double the usual GTA$ and RP.
